title: bestradingbro
author: bestradingbro
created_time: July 26, 2022, 09:20:38 PMLast edit: July 30, 2022, 01:29:55 AM by bestradingbro
content: Hello,Could you please be interested buying some ASIC Cryptocurrency MINERS through me? Company I work for offers Free Priority US/International Shipping on all orders, Warranty, and I could additionally offer a Discount on BULK orders. Please let me know if interested in any, or maybe someone you know could buy some. Thank you very much for your consideration.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------PLEASE CONTACT ME HERE BY PERSONAL MESSAGE TO BUY NOW!!!!! (or email: bitcointing@gmail.com) OR reach me via Telegram: t.me/vladxpI offer Discount $300 off per item if buying 10+!!!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: bestradingbro on July 26, 2022, 09:20:38 PMCould you please be interested buying some ASIC Cryptocurrency MINERS through me? Company I work for offersJudging by the other things you've already listed on your website [e.g. Wedding dresses], I'm going to assume that you're just a drop-shipper [in other words, I don't think you actually work for "any" company] and if for some unknown reason, the other involved party decides to not ship or rather scam your customers, how are you going to handle the situation?Quote from: bestradingbro on July 26, 2022, 09:20:38 PMI offer Discount $300 off per item if buying 10+!!!Quote from: bestradingbro on July 30, 2022, 01:13:01 AM($50 off per item if buying 10 or more)Which one is it? $300 or $50?

comments.author: bestradingbro
comments.created_time: July 30, 2022, 10:03:00 PMLast edit: July 30, 2022, 10:25:21 PM by bestradingbro
comments.body: Dear SFR10,Thank you for your comments and questions.The wedding dresses, I do affiliate marketing for Aliexpress, the miners I sell as a Sales Associate of an LLC US-based company....So, the company won't scam as they are an established Limited Liability Company (LLC) with an established client base and have been rated already with positive ratings.The discount of $50 off is per unit of Overclocking Boards, and $300 per unit if buying in bulk from the miners in the inventory. Please contact me for more details and I could tell you more of the company if you would like to purchase, thank you so much, and looking forward doing business with you eventually!!!

comments.author: ncsupanda

comments.body: Hello,Yes, I made that listing also. But, the company that does the sales is Happy Crypto Mines. It is an LLC US-based company.So, please consider making at least some purchases, please tell me in message which ones you get, thank you so much for your potential business!
